author: glasser
msg: "mergeinfo" in assorted error messages and comments.

author: glasser
msg: "mergeinfo" consistency: in the Serf mergeinfo report parser,
s/MERGE_INFO/MERGEINFO/ in the names of an enum.
(As of this revision, the (case-insensitive) string 'merge_info' only
exists in the code base as a merge_info_t in libsvn_ra_serf/merge.c,
which actually has nothing to do with mergeinfo.)

author: glasser
msg: Why "almost"?  Well, there's a C test that uses it, but that C test is
pretty wacky already (the mergeinfo it sets is invalid, it does a
svn_fs_get_mergeinfo on a non-existing path, etc).  And it doesn't
actually verify anything about the return value from
svn_fs_get_mergeinfo.  So ditch the test too.
(This change is similar to r28146 on the
sqlite-mergeinfo-without-mergeinfo branch; I should have done it on
